title: kanasu kaNDene
sahitya:
kanasu kaNDene manadalle kaLavaLa koNDene


anupallavi

  Enu heLasi tangi timmayyana pAdavanu kaNDe


caraNam 1    ponnada kaDaganiTTu timmaya tA pOlva nAmava iTTU 
anduge ghalukennuta ena munde bandu nindiddanalle
    caraNam 2    makara kuNDalavaniTTu timmaya tA kastUri tilakaniTTu 
gejje ghulukenuta svAmi tA bandu ninda nindiddanalle
    caraNam 3    muttina pallakki yatigaLu hottu nindiddaralle 
chatra cAmaradinda rangayya utsava mUrutiya
    caraNam 4    tAmara kamaladali krSNayya tA bandu nindiddanalle
vAyu bommAdigaLu rangayyana sEveya mADuvare
    caraNam 5    navaratna kettisida svAmi enna hrdaya maNTapadalli 
sarvAbharaNadinda purandara viTTalana kUDidEne
